amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to require the EPA to make the results of additional determinations under the bill publicly available online within 60 days of a determination.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to require the EPA to make the results of additional determinations under the bill publicly available online within 60 days of a determination.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tonko amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Tonko.
